ComicInfo.Summary:
GREAT JUMPING ON POINT FOR NEW READERS! THE REBIRTH STARTS HERE! After a lifetime of being manipulated by a succession of Masters, Andre Toulon's Puppets may have finally found a way out. Is the psychic Madam Adon the savior they have been looking for? And if so, what is the price of freedom? Features three variant covers - Color, Sketch and Photo - depicting Jester, limited to 1,500 copies each!
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|-------------------------------------------------------|-----------------------------------|------------------| | Reg | Regular Cover | Michela De Sacco & Daniel Morales | 1 | | Var | Limited Edition Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | Michela De Sacco & Yann Perrelet | 2 | | Var | Limited Edition Sketch Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | Michela De Sacco | 3 | | Var | Limited Edition Photo Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | Photo | 4 |
ComicInfo.Title: Rebirth (1 of 4)
